pageContext.course_type_long_description: Bring Minecraft to life using LEGO® parts! Build an Iron Golem, the Nether Portal, and the Ender Dragon. Students will explore real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture while building their favorite Minecraft objects.
pageContext.course_type_name: Minecraft Master Engineering with LEGO® Materials
